FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about our plans

MVNO stands for Mobile Virtual Network Operator. Vouch Mobile leases network capacity from AT&T at wholesale rates and passes those savings to you. You get the same AT&T towers and coverage, just at a much lower price.

Yes! Your calls, texts, and data all travel through AT&T's towers and infrastructure. The coverage map is identical to AT&T's. The only difference is the billing - you pay Vouch Mobile instead of AT&T.

Absolutely! Any phone currently working on AT&T will work seamlessly with Vouch Mobile. Just swap in our SIM card (or activate eSIM) and you're ready to go.

Yes! Vouch Mobile includes full access to AT&T's 5G network at no extra charge. Wherever AT&T has 5G coverage, you'll have 5G coverage.

We don't have expensive retail stores, celebrity endorsements, or massive marketing budgets. As an MVNO, we operate efficiently and pass those savings directly to our customers.

Yes! Transferring your number from AT&T (or any carrier) is simple and free. Most transfers complete in under 10 minutes.
